00017 extern char *http_server;
00018 
00019 extern int http_port;
00020 
00021 extern char *http_proxy_server;
00022 
00023 extern int http_proxy_port;
00024 
00025 
00026 /* return type */
00027 typedef enum
00028 {
00029 
00030     /*
00031      * Client side errors 
00032      */
00033     ERRHOST = -1,               /* No such host */
00034     ERRSOCK = -2,               /* Can't create socket */
00035     ERRCONN = -3,               /* Can't connect to host */
00036     ERRWRHD = -4,               /* Write error on socket while writing header */
00037     ERRWRDT = -5,               /* Write error on socket while writing data */
00038     ERRRDHD = -6,               /* Read error on socket while reading result */
00039     ERRPAHD = -7,               /* Invalid answer from data server */
00040     ERRNULL = -8,               /* Null data pointer */
00041     ERRNOLG = -9,               /* No/Bad length in header */
00042     ERRMEM = -10,               /* Can't allocate memory */
00043     ERRRDDT = -11,              /* Read error while reading data */
00044     ERRURLH = -12,              /* Invalid url - must start with 'http://' */
00045     ERRURLP = -13,              /* Invalid port in url */
00046 
00047 
00048     /*
00049      * Return code by the server 
00050      */
00051     ERR400 = 400,               /* Invalid query */
00052     ERR403 = 403,               /* Forbidden */
00053     ERR408 = 408,               /* Request timeout */
00054     ERR500 = 500,               /* Server error */
00055     ERR501 = 501,               /* Not implemented */
00056     ERR503 = 503,               /* Service overloaded */
00057 
00058     /*
00059      * Succesful results 
00060      */
00061     OK0 = 0,                    /* successfull parse */
00062     OK201 = 201,                /* Ressource succesfully created */
00063     OK200 = 200                 /* Ressource succesfully read */
00064 } http_retcode;
00065 
00066 
00067 /* prototypes */
00068 
00069 http_retcode http_put ( char *filename, char *data, int length, int overwrite, char *type );
00070 http_retcode http_get ( char *filename, char **pdata, int *plength, char *typebuf );
00071 http_retcode http_parse_url ( char *url, char **pfilename );
00072 http_retcode http_delete ( char *filename );
00073 http_retcode http_head ( char *filename, int *plength, char *typebuf );
